title: Review: Lift Me Up (but Where?). A Dance of Escape and Connection.
description: In Kimberly Bartosik’s “The Encounter,” young performers and professional dancers navigate a world in turmoil, looking for a way out.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
media:credit: Julieta Cervantes for The New York Times
media:description: Logan Farmer (aloft) in Kimberly Bartosik’s “The Encounter,” part of the Crossing the Line Festival.
